title: Nicodemus National Historic Site: Planning
body: Planning       General Management Plan (1.99MB PDF form)      Centennial Initiative 2016      Long-Range Interpretive Plan (2.72 PDF)      Scope of Collection Statement (318.32KB PDF) The Nicodemus National Historic Site museum collections size is 25,148 according to FY12 collections management reporting.      Nicodemus National Historic Site Historic Structures Report (HSR) (PDF 26.7MB)      Nicodemus National Historic Site Cultural Landscape Report January 2003 (103.49 MB PDF)http://www.nps.gov/history/history/online_books/nico/nico_clr.pdf      Nicodemus National Historic Site Historic Resources Study (HRS) (PDF 51.1 MB)
